import { ReactComponentElement, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./Slider.css"; const Slider = () => { const [leftPosition, setLeftPosition] = useState(0); let itemWidth = window.screen.width / 3; // Adjust this value as needed const containerWidth = itemWidth * 7 + (24 * 7 + 32 * 2 + 70); // Number of items const onLeftClick = () => { let left = leftPosition + itemWidth; if (left > 0) { left = 0; } setLeftPosition(left); }; const onRightClick = () => { let left = leftPosition - itemWidth; if (left < -containerWidth + window.innerWidth) { left = -containerWidth + window.innerWidth; } setLeftPosition(left); }; return ( <>
